description: This file defines a React functional component 'QuizList' that displays a list of available quizzes, handles fetching quizzes from an API, and initiates a quiz attempt when the user starts a quiz. It manages state for quizzes, loading status, errors, and user input, and interacts with external API functions 'fetchQuizzes' and 'startAttempt'.

methods.name: QuizList({ onStart, defaultUserName = "" })
methods.description: React component that renders a list of quizzes with the ability for users to select and start a quiz, while entering their name.

methods.name: handleStart
methods.description: Handles starting a quiz attempt by validating user input, calling the API, and invoking the 'onStart' callback with attempt details.
